name: Auto Filter Bot V2
description: A Filter Bot Which Doesnt Need Manuall Filter Adding

APP_ID.description: Your APP ID From my.telegram.org or @UseTGXBot

API_HASH.description: Your API Hash From my.telegram.org or @UseTGXBot

DB_URI.description: Your Mongo DB URL Obtained From mongodb.com

USER_SESSION.description: A Pyrogram User Session String. Generated From @PyrogramStringBot

SESSION_STRING.description: Session string, read the README to learn how to export it with Pyrogram

CHAT.description: ID of Channel or Group where the Bot plays Music

ADMINS.description: ID of Users who can use Admin commands(for multiple users seperated by space)

ADMIN_ONLY.description: Change it to 'N' if you want to make /play and /dplay available for everyone. By default only admins of CHAT can use it.

MAXIMUM_DURATION.description: Maximum duration of song to be played using /play or /dplay

STREAM_URL.description: URL of Radio station or Youtube live video url to stream with /radio command

REPLY_MESSAGE.description: A reply message to those who message the USER account in PM. Make it blank if you do not need this feature.
REPLY_MESSAGE.value: Hello Sir, I am a bot to play music, not havimg time to chat with you.

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID

CHANNEL_ID.description: make a channel (database channel), then make the bot as admin in channel, and it's id

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: id of the channel or group, if you want enable force sub feature else put 0

START_MESSAGE.description: Optional: start message of bot, use HTML parsemode format
START_MESSAGE.value:
Hello {first}

I can store private files in Specified Channel and other users can access it from special link.

DATABASE_NAME.description: Your database name from mongoDB. ( Default will 'Cluster0' )

SAVE_USER.description: Do you need to save user details? Usefull for getting userinfo and total user counts. May reduce filter capacity. Give yes or no

AUTH_USERS.description: ID of users that can use the bot commands

WEBHOOK.description: No need to change this field!
